p: Brine shrimp lethality assay was a preliminary toxicity investigation. Ten shrimps per vial were added. Extract plants at 10, 100, and 1000 ug/ml were prepared on filtered paper. After 24 h, the number surviving were recorded and determined percentage LC 50 from the graph. LC 50 value lower than 1000 ug/ml is considered Toxic.[ 13]
